wargame.map

Class MapGeneratorParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.map.MapGeneratorParameter

  • public class MapGeneratorParameter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defined the parameters used by the map generator to generate a map.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
